item.title: 印度科技巨头 TCS 裁员预示着人工智能对价值 2830 亿美元的外包行业的冲击
item.description: 印度外包巨头塔塔咨询服务公司（Tata Consultancy Services）决定裁减 12000 多个工作岗位，这标志着由人工智能推动的更广泛趋势的开始，专家表示，在未来两三年内，这个价值 2830 亿美元的行业可能会裁减约 50 万个工作岗位。【原文：Indian outsourcing giant Tata Consultancy Services' decision to cut over 12,000 jobs signals the start of a broader AI-fueled trend that could end up eliminating around half a million jobs over the next two to three years from the $283 billion sector, experts said.】

item.title: 渣打银行成立合资企业在香港发行稳定币
item.description: 渣打银行周五表示，该公司已与战略合作伙伴成立了一家合资企业，以申请在香港发行稳定币的执照，这是在香港稳定币立法生效几天后。【原文：Standard Chartered said on Friday that it has formed a joint venture with strategic partners to apply for a license to issue stablecoins in Hong Kong, days after the city's stablecoin legislation came into effect.】

item.title: 特朗普要求辞职后，英特尔首席执行官称正与美国政府合作
item.description: 英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武周四表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当天早些时候要求他立即辞职后，该芯片制造商正在与美国政府接触，以澄清关切，并确保提供准确的信息。【原文：Intel Chief Executive Lip-Bu Tan on Thursday said the chipmaker is engaging with the U.S. administration to clarify concerns and ensure accurate information is provided after President Donald Trump demanded his immediate resignation earlier in the day.】

item.title: 特朗普对俄罗斯石油买家征收关税带来经济和政治风险
item.description: 从惩罚巴西到试图遏制芬太尼的进口，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将关税威胁作为一种万能的外交政策武器。【原文：From punishing Brazil to trying to curb imports of fentanyl, U.S. President Donald Trump has wielded the threat of tariffs as an all-purpose foreign policy weapon.】

item.title: 高管表示，美国零售商百思买将把印度技术中心的员工人数增加 40% 以上
item.description: 一位高级管理人员告诉路透社记者，随着越来越多的跨国公司在印度设立办事处，以利用印度不断增长的人才库，美国电子连锁企业百思买计划在未来几个月内将其印度技术中心的员工人数增加 40% 以上。【原文：U.S. electronics chain Best Buy plans to expand the headcount at its Indian tech centre by over 40% in the next few months, a senior executive told Reuters, as more global corporations set up offices in the country to tap its growing talent pool.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：Binance 与 BBVA 合作，让客户在交易所外保留资产
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，Binance 正在与西班牙银行 BBVA 合作，允许客户在加密货币交易所之外持有资产。【原文：Binance is working with Spanish bank BBVA to allow customers to hold their assets off the crypto exchange, Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为美联储将在未来四次会议上逐次降息
item.description: 摩根大通（J.P.Morgan）周四在一份报告中称，由于劳动力市场和整体经济出现放缓迹象，该公司目前预计美国联邦储备委员会将在未来四次会议上每次降息25个基点，从而使政策利率降至3.5%。【原文：J.P.Morgan now expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut interest rates by 25 basis points at each of its next four meetings, bringing the policy rate to 3.5%, it said in a note on Thursday, as the labor market and broader economy show signs of slowing.】

item.title: 早间新闻特朗普采取行动扩大对美联储的控制
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中远集团寻求在价值 230 亿美元的巴拿马运河港口交易中获得至少 20% 的股份
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，中国国有航运巨头中远集团（Cosco）的目标是在一项涉及巴拿马运河战略资产的价值 230 亿美元的港口交易中获得至少 20%-30%的股份，因为中国政府正在就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）此前曾称赞过的出售条款进行重新谈判。【原文：China's state-owned shipping giant Cosco aims to secure at least 20%-30% stake in a $23 billion ports deal involving strategic assets in the Panama Canal, as Beijing moves to renegotiate the terms of a sale previously praised by U.S. President Donald Trump, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 一家拥有 240 年历史的瑞士钟表制造商为赶在特朗普的关税最后期限之前而展开的竞赛
item.description: 随着本周美国关税最后期限的临近，瑞士钟表制造商DuBois et fils急于向美国运送五款高端手表，每款价值数千美元。到本周三，该公司已封锁了其美国网站上的订单。现在，首席执行官托马斯-施泰因曼（Thomas Steinemann）正在计算他需要提高的价格。【原文：As a U.S. tariff deadline neared this week, Swiss watch manufacturer DuBois et fils rushed to ship five high-end watches worth thousands of dollars each to the United States. By Wednesday the firm had blocked orders on its U.S. website. Now CEO Thomas Steinemann is calculating the price hikes he'll need to make.】

item.title: 看好人工智能前景提振第一季度盈利，软银股价飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 周五上午，软银集团（SoftBank Group）股价跳涨逾 13%，创下历史新高，表明投资者支持这家日本科技投资者在第一季度利润超出预期后推动人工智能发展。【原文：Shares in SoftBank Group jumped more than 13% to a record high on Friday morning in a show of investor support for the Japanese technology investor's AI push after first quarter profit beat expectations.】

item.title: 中国中芯国际称特朗普关税并未导致预期的 "硬着陆
item.description: 中国顶级代工企业中芯国际的联席首席执行官周五表示，美国的关税政策并未导致该公司最初担心的 "硬着陆"，强劲的国内需求将使其产能在10月份之前一直处于紧张状态。【原文：China's top foundry SMIC's co-CEO said on Friday that U.S. tariff policy had not resulted in the "hard landing" that the company was initially worried about and that strong domestic demand will keep its production capacity tight until October.】

item.title: 财报提振日本股指创历史新高，亚洲其他市场有所缓和
item.description: 在积极的盈利报告和美国将取消对日本商品征收重叠关税的预期之后，日本股市周五大涨。【原文：Japanese shares surged on Friday after positive earnings reports and expectations the U.S. would remove overlapping tariffs on the country's goods, while shares were down in other Asian markets after a late retreat on Wall Street during the previous session.】

item.title: 特朗普的美联储人选、英国央行的 "鹰派 "降息令美元承压
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普临时选择的美联储代理理事人选激起了人们对在杰罗姆-鲍威尔任期结束后由一个鸽派人选接替其职务的预期，美元周五承压，并有望每周下跌。【原文：The dollar was under pressure on Friday and was on course for a weekly fall as U.S. President Donald Trump's temporary choice for a fill-in Federal Reserve Governor stoked expectations for a dovish pick to replace chair Jerome Powell when his term ends.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Meta 选择 Pimco 和 Blue Owl 为其数据中心融资 290 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，Meta 已选择投资管理公司 Pimco 和另类资产管理公司 Blue Owl Capital 为其路易斯安那州农村地区的数据中心项目提供 290 亿美元的融资。【原文：Meta has selected investment management firm Pimco and alternative asset manager Blue Owl Capital for a $29 billion financing deal related to its data center projects in rural Louisiana, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 关税给需求前景蒙上阴影，石油将创六月以来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 周五亚洲早盘，油价变化不大，但因投资者对周四生效的关税对全球经济的影响表示担忧，油价将创下自6月底以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in early Asian hours on Friday, but were headed for their steepest weekly losses since late-June, as investors expressed concern over the impact to the global economy from tariffs that kicked into effect on Thursday.】

item.title: 7 月摘要显示，日本央行就恢复加息的可能性进行了辩论
item.description: 日本央行 7 月份会议的意见摘要显示，一些日本央行决策者警告称通胀压力正在上升，其中一位决策者表示有可能在年底前恢复加息，从而保持了近期加息的可能性。【原文：Some Bank of Japan policymakers warned of mounting inflationary pressures and one signaled the chance of resuming interest rate increases by year-end, a summary of opinions at the July meeting showed, keeping alive the possibility of a near-term rate hike.】

item.title: 法官驳回美国消费者监督机构对益百利的诉讼
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件，消费者金融保护局针对信用评级巨头益百利公司（Experian）有关信用报告准确性的诉讼于周三被驳回。【原文：A lawsuit filed by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau against credit rating giant Experian over credit report accuracy was dismissed on Wednesday, according to a court filing.】

item.title: Heartflow 在美国首次公开募股中融资 3.167 亿美元，医疗科技上市企业试图卷土重来
item.description: 医疗技术公司 Heartflow 周四表示，该公司在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 3.167 亿美元，为其在纳斯达克的首次公开募股做好了准备，这是对投资者对医疗技术公司胃口的又一次考验。【原文：Medical technology firm Heartflow said on Thursday it had raised $316.7 million in its U.S. initial public offering, setting the stage for its Nasdaq debut in another test of investor appetite for medical tech companies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚隐私监管机构就 2022 年网络攻击事件起诉 Optus
item.description: 澳大利亚隐私监管机构周五表示，已就新加坡电信旗下电信运营商 Optus 于 2022 年 9 月遭遇网络攻击一事对该公司提起法律诉讼。【原文：Australia's privacy regulator has initiated legal proceedings against Optus, the Singapore Telecommunications-owned telecom operator, over a cyber attack it faced in September 2022, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国钢铁工人工会为下一份炼油厂工人合同提出建议
item.description: 美国钢铁工人联合会（USW）全国石油谈判主席迈克-史密斯（Mike Smith）说，在匹兹堡举行的 300 多名炼油厂和化工厂工人会议周四批准了将于 2026 年初与能源公司开始的劳资谈判提案。【原文：More than 300 United Steelworkers union (USW) refinery and chemical plants workers meeting in Pittsburgh approved on Thursday proposals for labor negotiations set to begin early in 2026 with energy companies, said Mike Smith, chair of national oil bargaining for the union.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Iress 确认与 Blackstone、Thoma Bravo 就潜在竞购进行谈判
item.description: 澳大利亚 Iress 公司周五证实，该公司正与 Blackstone 和 Thoma Bravo 就金融软件公司的潜在收购要约进行早期讨论。【原文：Australia's Iress confirmed on Friday that it was in early stages of discussion with Blackstone and Thoma Bravo for a potential offer for the financial software firm.】

item.title: 保费增长、索赔减少，澳大利亚昆士保险公司中期利润超预期
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚昆士兰保险公司（QBE）的中期盈利超出了市场预期，这主要得益于北美和国际业务保费的强劲增长，以及赔付率的限制。【原文：Australian insurer QBE beat market estimates for interim earnings on Friday, helped by strong premium growth in North America and international divisions coupled with claims being limited.】

item.title: 永利因澳门业务疲软未达季度预期
item.description: 周四，赌场运营商永利度假村（Wynn Resorts）第二季度利润不及预期，原因是澳门业务低迷。【原文：Casino operator Wynn Resorts missed second-quarter profit expectations on Thursday, owing to sluggish Macau business.】

item.title: Jack in the Box 首席执行官称西班牙裔消费者因 "不确定性 "而缩减开支
item.description: Jack in the Box 的首席执行官说，Jack in the Box 核心市场的西班牙裔消费者 "面临不确定性，已经缩减了开支"，这个问题对这家美国快餐连锁店的销售产生了巨大影响。【原文：Hispanic consumers in Jack in the Box's core markets "face uncertainty and have pulled back their spending," with the issue having an outsized impact on the U.S. fast-food chain's sales, its CEO said.】

item.title: 需求稳定，摩托罗拉解决方案上调年度收入预期
item.description: 安全和企业安全服务提供商摩托罗拉解决方案公司周四上调了年度收入预期，原因是安全和安全解决方案需求强劲。【原文：Safety and enterprise security services provider Motorola Solutions raised annual revenue forecast on Thursday, driven by robust demand for its safety and security solutions.】

item.title: 澳大利亚矿业公司 Fortescue 获得近 20 亿美元贷款以推进脱碳进程
item.description: Fortescue周五表示，它已获得价值142亿元人民币（19.8亿美元）的银团定期贷款，这家澳大利亚矿业公司希望以此支持其雄心勃勃的去碳化计划。【原文：Fortescue said on Friday it had secured a syndicated term loan facility worth 14.2 billion Chinese yuan ($1.98 billion) as the Australian miner looks to support its ambitious decarbonisation plans.】

item.title: 日本敦促修改美国总统关税令
item.description: 日本政府周五表示，日本最高关税谈判代表赤泽亮世在华盛顿与美国高级官员会晤时 "强烈 "敦促美国修改总统征税令。【原文：Japan's top tariff negotiator Ryosei Akazawa "strongly" urged the United States to revise the presidential order on the levies at his meetings with top U.S. officials in Washington, the Japanese government said on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特斯拉解散 Dojo 超级计算机团队
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，特斯拉正在解散其 Dojo 超级计算机团队，该团队负责人彼得-班农（Peter Bannon）将离开公司。【原文：Tesla is disbanding its Dojo supercomputer team and its leader, Peter Bannon, will depart the company, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Pemex 计划令等待数十亿美元逾期付款的供应商失望
item.description: 墨西哥一家代表全球油田服务公司的协会负责人周四表示，尽管官方承诺加快付款速度，但墨西哥国家石油公司（Pemex）的新业务计划缺乏解决其与供应商之间巨额债务的具体措施。 AMESPAC协会主席拉斐尔-埃斯皮诺（Rafael Espino）告诉路透社记者，在周二与财政部、能源部和Pemex公司官员举行的会议上，没有提到该公司将如何偿还2024年和2025年上半年已完成工作的债务。 埃斯皮诺说，截至 6 月底，AMESPAC 成员被拖欠了约 650 亿比索（约合 34.9 亿美元）的工程款，而这些工程款甚至尚未开具发票。 "埃斯皮诺在接受采访时说："这令人失望，因为没有具体提及 2024 年的债务。"如果我们不得不等待用未来的现金流来偿还......这笔债务将继续得不到偿还，直接影响的将是生产"。 不过，埃斯皮诺补充说，与会官员表示，墨西哥石油公司将加快付款速度，不会让发票账龄超过两个月，并预计手头将有更多现金。这些现金将来自较低的税负、最近发行的 120 亿美元债务以及新设立的用于 2025 年项目的 130 亿美元特别基金。 Pemex 欠下了约 230 亿美元的供应商债务和近 1000 亿美元的金融债务，尽管近年来政府为其履行债务提供了数十亿美元的支持。 虽然支付了一些款项并经常做出承诺，但债务仍在不断累积，给服务供应商造成了前所未有的支付危机。 埃斯皮诺说，AMESPAC 对该计划表示欢迎，但正在寻求与当局建立一个正式的工作组，以了解新的 2025 年投资工具及其相关服务付款的规则、时间表和资格。 该协会认为，偿还未偿债务对于重新启用闲置设备和帮助实现墨西哥原油日产量 180 万桶的目标是必要的，而这一目标在很大程度上依赖于墨西哥石油公司。 AMESPAC 的成员包括全球最大的四家能源服务公司贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）、哈里伯顿（Halliburton）、威德福（Weatherford）和 SLB，以及采矿和运输集团墨西哥集团（Grupo Mexico）。 最近，大亨卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）控制的卡索集团（Grupo Carso）报告称，Pemex 欠其各种服务费超过 7 亿美元，其中一些债务可追溯到两年前。 Grupo Mexico 的一家子公司报告称，由于拖欠款项，它已暂时停止了四个平台的开采，而哈里伯顿公司也表示，它与 Pemex 的付款问题仍未解决。 (1 美元 = 18.6360 墨西哥比索）【原文：The head of an association representing global oilfield service firms in Mexico said on Thursday that a new business plan for state oil company Pemex lacks concrete measures to address its massive debt with suppliers, despite official promises to speed up payments. Rafael Espino, president of the AMESPAC association, told Reuters that in a Tuesday meeting with officials from the finance and energy ministries and Pemex, there was no mention of how the company would pay down debts for work already performed in 2024 and the first half of 2025. As of the end of June, Espino said, AMESPAC members were owed about 65 billion pesos ($3.49 billion) for work that has not yet even been invoiced. "It was a disappointment because there was no specific reference to the 2024 debts," Espino said in an interview. "If we have to wait for it to be paid with future cash flow... this debt will continue to go unpaid and the immediate effect will be on production." However, Espino added that officials at the meeting said Pemex would speed up payments, not let invoices age beyond two months, and that it expects to have more cash on hand. This would come from a lower tax burden, a recent $12 billion debt issuance, and a new $13 billion special fund for 2025 projects. Pemex is saddled with supplier debts of around $23 billion and financial debt of nearly $100 billion, despite receiving billions in government support in recent years to meet its obligations. While making some payments and frequent promises, the debts have continued to accumulate, creating an unprecedented payment crisis for service providers. Espino said AMESPAC welcomes the plan but is seeking to establish a formal working group with authorities to understand the rules, timeline and eligibility for the new 2025 investment vehicle and its associated service payments. The association argues that paying off outstanding debts is necessary to reactivate idled equipment and help meet Mexico's national crude production target of 1.8 million barrels per day (bpd), a goal heavily reliant on Pemex. AMESPAC members include four of the world's largest energy services firms Baker Hughes , Halliburton , Weatherford , and SLB , and mining and transportation conglomerate Grupo Mexico . Recently, Grupo Carso - controlled by tycoon Carlos Slim - reported that Pemex owes it more than $700 million for various services, with some debts dating back two years. A subsidiary of Grupo Mexico reported it had temporarily halted four platforms due to non-payment, and Halliburton has stated its payment issues with Pemex remain unresolved. ($1 = 18.6360 Mexican pesos)】
